document_data.name: Arietta Innevar
document_data.mainbody: '''Arietta Innevar''' was the persona by a [[doppelganger]] that pretended to be of two sisters traveling the [[Sword Coast]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: "Arietta" and her sister [[Zelina Innevar|"Zelina"]] took on the likenesses of unassuming travelers that sought company while navigating the trade routes of the Sword Coast. They would join a band of travelers or caravan for some time, earn some level of trust among the group, then be poised to strike. The Innevar "sisters" would lure a lone member of their traveling companions away in night and attack when their guard was down.
document_data.History: During the 1480s DR,{{ToD-time}} "Arietta" and her sister traveled north along the [[Trade Way]] towards the direction of [[Waterdeep]].
